jbittorrent

Class MessageReceiver

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • jbittorrent.MessageReceiver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class MessageReceiver
extends java.lang.Thread
    Thread created to listen for incoming message from remote peers. When data is read, message type is determined and a new Message object (either Message_HS or Message_PP) is created and passed to the corresponding receiver
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    Baptiste Dubuis, Sandra Ferrer Celma

      • MessageReceiver

        public MessageReceiver(java.lang.String id,
               java.io.InputStream is)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Create a new Message receiver for a given peer
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the peer that has been assigned this receiver
        is - InputStream
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

    • Method Detail

      • pushMessageRefreshEndGameStrategy

        public void pushMessageRefreshEndGameStrategy()
        Introduces a new message: REFRESH_ENDGAME_STRATEGY.

        . It is an internal message that doesn’t belong to the bittorrent protocol. The task is informed that the selected piece is already downloaded by another task. Consequently, has to restart the process of selection of piece.

      • pushMessageCancelPieceEndGameStrategy

        public void pushMessageCancelPieceEndGameStrategy(int indexPiece)
        Introduces a new message: CAMCEL_PIECE_ENDGAME_STRATEGY message.

        It is an internal message that doesn’t belong to the bittorrent protocol. The task is informed that the selected piece is already downloaded by another task. Will have to send the cancelation messages, of those blocks that have been solicited and are waiting receive.

        Parameters:
        indexPiece - int Index of piece

      • run

        public void run()
        Reads data from the inputstream, creates new messages according to the received data and fires MessageReceived method of the listeners with the new message in parameter. Loops as long as the 'run' variable is true
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        Overrides:
        run in class java.lang.Thread
